item.title: About
item.description: I am Gauransh Kumar a first-year student of Computer Science Master’s at the GEODES and RALI lab within the department of Computer Science and Operations Resarch (DIRO) at Université de Montréal. My area of research interests lies in Model Driven Engineering, Software Engineering, and Natural Language Processing. My major reasearch focus is on the application of NLP techniques and LLM’s in the field of Software Engineering Systematic Literature Review (SLR). The goal is to automate the Screening phase of SLR using NLP techniques and LLM’s.
